description: Osteopenia and osteoporosis are two conditions characterized by low bone mineral density. Osteopenia refers to decreased bone mineral density that is not severe enough to be classified as osteoporosis. Osteoporosis is a more severe form of bone loss which can increase the risk of fractures.

attributes.name: presence
attributes.description: Indicates whether osteoporosis or osteopenia is present or if the mineral density is normal.
